title: Dharamvir Singh
text:
Dharamvir Singh (born 5 August 1990) represented India in Men's Hockey during the <a href="2012%20London%20Olympics">2012 London Olympics</a>. He was part of the Indian team that won the silver medal at the <a href="2014%20Commonwealth%20Games">2014 Commonwealth Games</a>.
He supports <a href="Indian%20Collegiate%20Athletic%20Program%20%28ICAP%29">Indian Collegiate Athletic Program</a> (ICAP) and has agreed to be a mentor for Hockey.
